ithin me manas dekata ma kathakarala kalin kiyapu widihata sahena pirisak ekathu karagaththath pramanawath tharamin sannaddha balayak goda nagaganna bariwechcha hinda janatha wimukthi peramune 1971 karapu karalla asarthaka wuna. 1972 di rata janarajayak bawata pathkala nisath idam pawaraganima wage adhirajya wirodhi saha samajawadi wadapiliwelak anugamanaya kala nisath panthi paha haraha goda nangagath adahas balakotu durwala karanna bandaranayaka mathiniyata puluwan wuna.
